statements: UPDATE CustomerServiceTickets SET resolution_status = 'Resolved' WHERE ticket_id = 101
UPDATE CustomerServiceTickets SET customer_name = 'John Doe', issue_description = 'Unable to log in', resolution_status = 'Pending' WHERE ticket_id = 102

UPDATE ticket_history SET action_taken = 'Resolved ticket and updated status', action_timestamp = '2022-08-15 10:30:00' WHERE history_id = 201;

UPDATE CustomerServiceAgents SET department = 'Technical Support' WHERE agent_id = 201;

UPDATE tickets SET status = 'In Progress', resolved = false WHERE ticket_id = 123;
